ComicInfo.Title: Believe, Part Three
ComicInfo.Summary: Having learned a certain unpleasant truth, Hughie sets out to discover just how dangerous things will now be for the Boys. Frenchie and the Female stay glued to the Homelander, MM almost blows his top, and Annie hears some words of wisdom from an unexpected source. Butcher, meanwhile, gives Hughie the scoop on one of the team's highest-placed informants... but the most dreadful secret of all is still to come, in part three of "Believe.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-19 09:21:02. [CVDB232417]
ComicInfo.Characters: Butcher, Female of the Species, Frenchman, Greg Mallory, Guiseppe McGuinea, Mother's Milk, Queen Maeve, Sean McGuinea, Starlight, Terror, The Homelander, The Legend, Wee Hughie
ComicInfo.Locations: Central Park, Flatiron Building, New York City, New York State, The Bronx
